chapter.title: Knot DNS Configuration Reference
chapter.para: This reference describe every configuration option in Knot DNS.

section.title: system
section.para: The system statement contains general options related to the operating system and other general options which don't fit anywhere else.

section.title: Options
identity
section.para: Identity of the server (see RFC 4892). Not used yet.

section.title: version
section.para: Version of the server (see RFC 4892). Not used yet.

section.title: nsid
section.para: Use a string format "text" or a hexstring f.e. 0x01ab00

section.title: storage
section.para: The working directory of the Knot DNS, it is used to store compiled zone files and it's also a default location of the pidfile.

section.title: pidfile
section.para: Default value: knot.pid in storage directory)

section.title: workers
section.para: Number of workers (threads) per interface. This option is used to force number of threads used per interface.
Default value: unset (auto-estimates optimal value from the number of online CPUs)

section.title: user
section.para: System user or user.group under which the Knot DNS is run after starting and binding to interfaces.

section.title: keys
section.para: The keys statement sets up the TSIG keys used to authenticate zone transfers.

section.title: Options
section.para:
Contains one or more:
key_id algorithm "key-contents";
